Example SMJ Article

Abstract

Research Summary This is the full abstract text rendered in the Wiley article DOM. It is substantially longer than the meta teaser and should be selected by the verifier. The abstract continues with additional details about methods, findings, and implications so that the extractor can distinguish it from the truncated metadata description.

Managerial Summary This second paragraph is included to ensure the DOM selector returns a realistic multi-paragraph abstract section instead of a short snippet.
